root.name: Rainbow Skies
root.description: OverviewRainbow Skies is a fantasy role-playing game with tactical turn based combat developed by SideQuest Studios. It is a follow-up to their PlayStation 3 and Vita game Rainbow Moon, featuring a new world and cast of characters, and gameplay enhancements like a monster training system and improved side quests.The game will feature two parallel worlds with light and dark themes. The developers have stated that the dungeons will feature unique assets and objects.It is due out for PlayStation 3 and Vita in late 2014.
